content: अभितप् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To irradiate with heat, heat, inflame; अभितप्तमयोपि मार्दवं भजते कैव कथा शरीरिषु <ls>R. 8. 43</ls>; <ls n="R.">19. 56.</ls> {@--2@} To pain, distress, wound, afflict. {%--<ab>pass.</ab>%} To suffer intensely, be afflicted. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To pain, distress, afflict.
